basics.name: Tongze Mao
basics.label: Mobile App Developer & Full-Stack Engineer (HCI & AI)
basics.summary: A dedicated and creative full-stack developer specializing in mobile app development, human-computer interaction, and intelligent systems. Graduated CUM LAUDE from UC Irvine with dual degrees in Computer Science and Informatics, plus a minor in Statistics. Skilled in Swift, React, Flutter, Python, and more. Seeking to build innovative solutions that empower users and solve real-world problems.

work.name: SupTech
work.summary: Leading a two-person dev team at a fast-paced startup to build iOS and Android apps from scratch using Agile methodologies.
highlights: Developed two production-ready apps (iOS & Android) within three months.
Oversaw both front-end (Swift, React Native) and back-end (server architecture), plus partial UI/UX design.
Acted as project manager—organized sprints, set milestones, and ran regular progress reviews.
Created tutorials, user guides, and documentation to streamline deployment and user onboarding.
Fostered a culture of continuous learning and direct communication with both colleagues and clients.

work.name: HD EDUCATION
work.summary: Designing and teaching comprehensive calculus courses, mentoring a diverse student population, and delivering advanced educational resources.
highlights: Created full course materials covering Antiderivatives, Fundamental Theorem of Calculus, and more.
Maintained a high standard of student engagement and consistently positive feedback.
Developed strong communication techniques, enabling interactive learning environments and real-time support.

work.name: Ren Lab, The Chinese University of Hong Kong
work.summary: Participated in EndoNeRF, a neural radiance field project aimed at reconstructing endoscopic procedures.
highlights: Performed extensive literature reviews on NeRF and medical imaging techniques.
Collaborated in data processing and visualization to improve in-body scene reconstruction.
Gained hands-on experience in AI-based solutions and advanced 3D modeling tools.

volunteer.summary: Established a daily self-learning initiative and online community to encourage continuous personal and collaborative education.
highlights: Allocated daily study sessions, with over 200 books personally read and analyzed.
Launched a group-based accountability system, promoting knowledge-sharing among peers.
Fostered a motivating environment that underscores the importance of lifelong learning.

volunteer.summary: Assisted in the operation and organization of theatrical events, ensuring a seamless cultural experience.
highlights: Accumulated 46 hours of service, supporting ticket inspection, cleaning, and audience facilitation.
Enhanced attendee satisfaction through proactive communication and efficient problem-solving.
Strengthened community engagement in the performing arts sector.

volunteer.summary: Participated in a one-day event to plant trees and clean urban areas.
highlights: Helped create sustainable green spaces by planting and supporting new trees.
Learned about the ecological impact of urban forestry and community collaboration.

education.area: Computer Science & Informatics, Minor in Statistics

education.institution: The Chinese University of Hong Kong

awards.title: UCI CUM LAUDE
awards.summary: Earned upon graduating with outstanding academic performance.

awards.title: UCI Dean’s Honor List (9 Quarters)
awards.summary: Recognized for achieving high grades throughout multiple quarters.

awards.title: Arcadia High School Salutatorian
awards.summary: Graduated second in a highly competitive class with a 3.97 GPA.

awards.title: Future Art China International Competition
awards.summary: Selected as one of the top 100 paintings out of 10,000 entries; exhibited at the Lincoln Center in New York City.

certificates.name: Career Skills Certificate: Computer Programming IB Java
certificates.summary: Highest-level certificate in Java programming at my school, emphasizing object-oriented concepts and team collaboration.

certificates.name: Career Skills Certificate: Computer Programming I
certificates.summary: Introduced core programming methodology, control structures, and language fundamentals.

certificates.name: Career Skills Certificate: Computer Programming II Java
certificates.summary: Covered advanced OOP concepts, searching/sorting algorithms, and UML-based software design.

interests.name: Digital Illustration & Sticker Design
keywords: Created popular sticker sets (crocodile series, fuzzy monsters) with 10k+ total sends
Experimenting with new forms of visual expression

interests.name: Writing & Literature
keywords: Daily practice of classical Chinese writing
Awarded 4th place in a classical Chinese writing competition

projects.name: DoneTodo
projects.summary: A time-planning app with intuitive drag-and-drop scheduling, offering real-time visualization of daily tasks.
highlights: Developed a statistics module for daily/weekly/monthly/annual time distribution
Designed minimalistic UI to reduce user cognitive load
Focus on mental wellbeing via simple, color-coded time blocks

projects.name: HowDidI (iOS App)
projects.summary: A paid résumé-sharing platform helping users monetize their professional experiences and achievements.
highlights: Led a team of three students, acting as PM and technical mentor
Implemented Swift + Firebase for real-time user data storage
Operated in an Agile environment with weekly sprints and stakeholder reviews

projects.name: WriterCards
projects.summary: An iOS app promoting creativity and self-exploration through daily journaling, developed solely in Swift.
highlights: Implemented advanced project management to avoid scope creep
Handled design, development, and testing single-handedly
Utilized Jira and GitHub for streamlined version control

projects.name: Goshsha App – Future AR Interactive Shopping Experience
projects.summary: Modernized an AR-based shopping prototype for Gen Z audiences, focusing on UI/UX and cross-platform performance.
highlights: Redesigned UI/UX for React Expo on iOS & Android
Optimized database performance to enhance data retrieval speeds
Maintained weekly stakeholder meetings for iterative feedback

projects.name: Spotify Browser (Web Application)
projects.summary: A high-performance, Angular-based music streaming web app simulating Spotify’s core features.
highlights: Used lazy loading & caching to improve responsiveness
Implemented MongoDB for multi-user data management
OAUTH-based authentication & integration with Spotify APIs

projects.name: LifeTune
projects.summary: Health-tracking app simplifying data overload for wellness-minded users.
highlights: Co-led user research and integrated feedback into iterative design
Delivered minimalistic dashboards & motivational insights
Implemented user-centered design processes in a team environment

projects.name: MyWellness
projects.summary: An iOS application tracking exercise, diet, and sleep patterns, built with Swift.
highlights: Developed a recommendation engine offering personalized health feedback
Created the app’s visuals and initial branding elements
Leveraged data-driven methods for actionable health insights

projects.name: Canvas for Neurodivergent Students
projects.summary: Enhanced LMS accessibility features (Dark Mode, Text-to-Speech) to aid neurodivergent learners.
highlights: Led user interviews to identify core pain points
Proposed design solutions to improve accessibility
Delivered wireframes and prototypes for stakeholder review

projects.name: CheckersAI
projects.summary: Created an AI agent for Checkers under UCI’s COMPSCI 171 (AI) course.
highlights: Developed autonomous game strategies using AI search algorithms
Implemented adaptive move selection to challenge human players

projects.name: Cancer Observer
projects.summary: A concept app recommending cancer screenings based on user health data.
highlights: Designed brand identity & user interface via WordPress
Introduced reminders for preventive care scheduling
Focused on improving user engagement with data-driven insights
